name: Dr. Maya Thompson
quote: Cold weather can dry out your pet’s skin — moisturize regularly!

name: Dr. Alex Rivera
quote: Watch for signs of hypothermia — shivering, weakness, and pale gums.

name: Dr. Priya Desai
quote: Boost immunity with omega-rich winter diets.

name: Dr. Liam Becker
quote: Older pets need joint support and shorter walks during cold months.
